description:
Newly renovated apartment is outfitted with stainless steel appliances, 4 large bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and luxury touches throughout. Tons of natural sunlight throughout

My place is close to Dunkin' Donuts, Atlantic Avenue, Essence Bar & Restaurant, Key Food, and Broadway Junction. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the coziness, the kitchen, the high ceilings, backyard . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

This apartment has so much space, big bedrooms, a nice size backyard, 2 bathrooms one shower one tub, closets in every room

My wife and myself are here to help 24 hours a day

A and C trian just 2 corners away, straight shot to the manhattan.
name: Amazing New 4 bedroom 2 bath with backyard
review: This was a great place for our 12  BFA students to stay in while visiting NYC. It was very clean and large, keys readily available for students to come and go, the C train is a simple 5 minute walk and a straight shoot to Manhattan. A few restaurants and many convenient stores in the neighborhood and great street parking. We were very happy with this place and will recommend to other departments at our school.
